title: Microsoft Viva: Topics bot brings you topic information to your Teams chat
description:
,We are introducing an exciting new way to interact with Topics. A new Teams bot for Viva Topics to bring important topic related information, activities and more to users on their Teams chat.

This feature will not rollout. Please refer to the changes coming to Topics: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/topics/changes-coming-to-topics?view=o365-worldwide
